creator: jeff@socialchange.net.au
text:
Hi,

'ant -help' does not list the short options for commands, like '-f' instead of
'-buildfile'. The attached patch fixes this.

Thanks,

--Jeff

Created attachment 1986
Patch to list short options in Ant help
